name: Kitty-Doggo Corner
description:
Welcome to the Kitty-Doggo Corner! A Virtual Reality cafe where you can take your time, while drinking a warm cat-puccino, enjoying the rainy day and watching the animals around you

Or maybe you prefer to sit in the sofa and watch TV and apprecciate the memes behind you.

Whatever you do, you are more than welcome, to pass by our comfy cafe

*In case of not having VR equipment, you can still play by using WASD keyboard to move around and left button mouse to grab and right button mouse to move the camera*

Developed by:
- dbrey 

- evsanz

- petayo

DISCLAIMER:
Most of the assets in the game is not ours, this was developed as a university project
